title: Best of the Program | Guests: Diana Furchtgott-Roth & Jim Harden | 6/9/22
description:
CEO of CompassCare Pregnancy Services Jim Harden joins Glenn to discuss the firebombing of his clinic and how the Democrats don't seem to care. Former chief economist Diana Furchtgott-Roth shares why inflation is out of control and what needs to be done to stop it. Glenn connects actor Matthew McConaughey's latest appearance at the White House to Hunter Biden. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
